Content:: Nishantha Muthuhettigamage is a Sri Lankan politician, a member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka. He belongs to the Sri Lanka Freedom Party.[1][2] He is the former deputy minister for Ports and Shipping in Sri Lanka.[3]  This article about a politician from Southern Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
